title: The Lion King
plot: A young lion prince is cast out of his pride by his cruel uncle, who claims he killed his father. While the uncle rules with an iron paw, the prince grows up beyond the Savannah, living by a philosophy: No worries for the rest of your days. But when his past comes to haunt him, the young prince must decide his fate: Will he remain an outcast or face his demons and become what he needs to be?
awards: Top Rated Movies #33 | Won 2 Oscars. Another 37 wins & 35 nominations.
writers: Irene Mecchi, Jonathan Roberts, Linda Woolverton, Burny Mattinson, Barry Johnson, Lorna Cook, Thom Enriquez, Andy Gaskill, Gary Trousdale, Jim Capobianco, Kevin Harkey, Jorgen Klubien, Chris Sanders, Tom Sito, Larry Leker, Joe Ranft, Rick Maki, Ed Gombert, Francis Glebas, Mark Kausler, J.T. Allen, George Scribner, Miguel Tejada-Flores, Jenny Tripp, Bob Tzudiker, Christopher Vogler, Kirk Wise, Noni White, Brenda Chapman
stars: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones, Whoopi Goldberg
companies: Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Animation Studios

trailer.title: The Lion King
trailer.videoDescription: Tricked into thinking he killed his father, a guilt ridden lion cub flees into exile and abandons his identity as the future King.

similars.title: Toy Story
similars.plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
similars.stars: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles

similars.title: WALL·E
similars.plot: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
similars.stars: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin

similars.title: Finding Nemo
similars.plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
similars.stars: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould

similars.title: Up
similars.plot: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.
similars.stars: Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger

similars.title: Monsters, Inc.
similars.plot: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.
similars.directors: Directors: Pete Docter, David Silverman, and 1 more credit »
similars.stars: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Mary Gibbs

similars.title: Toy Story 3
similars.plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.
similars.stars: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack

similars.title: The Lion King
similars.plot: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

similars.title: Inside Out
similars.plot: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.
similars.directors: Directors: Pete Docter, Ronnie Del Carmen
similars.stars: Amy Poehler, Bill Hader, Lewis Black

similars.title: Coco
similars.plot: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.
similars.stars: Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal, Benjamin Bratt

similars.title: How to Train Your Dragon
similars.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
similars.stars: Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Christopher Mintz-Plasse

similars.title: Spirited Away
similars.plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.
similars.stars: Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino

similars.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
similars.plot: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.
similars.directors: Directors: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, and 1 more credit »
similars.stars: Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld
